body:
Just stop throwing staff under the bus. It is annoying me you do not understand how much time they are taking for us. You are taking this for granted, we are lucky to have such honest staff members so be thankful, stop being so stubborn. Realize how much we have compared to some bad server's and be happy for the staff members point out the staffs pro's not only con's.


Best regards, Cezbla


This needs to stop I am feeling like crap not doing something about it, so I made this.

Please Don't spam about complaints just Skype message the staff member, it spams forums and it personally annoys me a lot.
